```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(tseries)
library(ggpubr)
library(forecast)
library(lubridate)
library(lmtest)
library(vars)
set.seed(2022)
data <- read.csv("CLOSINGPRICEDATA.csv")

```

```{r,echo=FALSE}


#data$Date <-mdy(data$Date)


datadif <-data  %>% mutate(difbtc = data$BTC - lag(data$BTC))

datadif <-datadif %>% mutate(difada = data$ADA - lag(data$ADA))

datadif <-datadif  %>% mutate(difwave = data$WAVES - lag(data$WAVES))

datadif <-datadif  %>% mutate(difeth = data$ETH - lag(data$ETH))


data1 <- datadif[2:100,7:11]
```

```{r}
var1 <- VAR(data1,p=20,type = 'const')
var1
```


```{r}
pred <- predict(var1)

ggplot()+geom_line(aes(x=as.Date(Date),y=BTC),data = data[1:110,])+
  scale_x_date(date_labels = "%m-%Y",breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(n = 15))+geom_line(aes(x=as.Date(data[101:110,]$Date),y=fore$BTC[,1]),color='red')+labs(title="VAR forecasts for Bitcoin",x="Date")
```
